translation.en: Fuck yes.
You need a towel, miss.
I need a drink, Brian, but I'd settle for a towel, thank you.

translation.en: That closet is magic.
Oh, it's just the basics really, miss.
When the apocalypse comes, I hope I'm with you.

Glad to hear luck went your way in the Butler trial.

I don't know how you do it, miss.
[woman] Anything decent come in?
There is something in your pigeonhole. Next-level stuff, I'd say.

translation.en: Intriguing. I'll take a look.
Shall I wait?
No. You should go.
Are you sure there's nothing I can do?
Yes, there is, Brian.
Have a glorious weekend.
There you go, madam.

-What could be bad on this beautiful day? -[woman 2 chuckles]

-[woman 4] There she is. -Hello, hello.

-[man] Thank you. -[woman 5] Enjoy your night.

translation.en: -Highly associated with wealth and wisdom. -Is that true?

translation.en: No. I just made it up. [chuckles]
-Cheeky Sophie. -[man 2] Happy birthday.
You have half your whole life ahead of you.

-Where's James? -Let me find out.
-Happy birthday, Mark. -Excuse me. Sorry.
-[Ellie] Lucy. -[Lucy] Ellie, darling.
-[Lucy] Hello. -You've reached James Whitehouse.
Please leave your name and number. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

translation.en: My darling man, where the fuck are you?
[woman] I counted.
I stood on the kerb, and I counted.

translation.en: And the little green man flashed for a mere five seconds.
translation.es: Y el hombrecito verdeparpadeó solo cinco segundos.

translation.en: -Well, that's not enough time, is it? -No, it's not, Minister.
translation.es: - No es suficiente tiempo, ¿no?- No, ministro.

translation.en: I mean, I think they decided that pedestrian crossings

translation.en: only needed a second per metre.

translation.en: Now, I know that you do have more important things to consider,
translation.es: Sé que tiene cosasmás importantes que considerar,

translation.en: but show me an old bird who could manage that.

translation.en: First of all, show me an old bird, Mrs Murray.
translation.es: Primero, yo no veo a ninguna vieja.

translation.en: And I take the safety of my constituents personally.

translation.en: What I want for my family is what I want for Mrs Sibyl Murray of Thurlsdon.

translation.en: We'll write a letter.
-Right away. -Thank you very much indeed.
-[James] Got everything? Okay. -[woman] Yes, sir.

-[driver] Sure. -Thank you.

It was the most relaxing holiday of my life.

Oh. Speak of the devil.

James can't make it. There's been some sort of emergency,

translation.en: which usually means a debate about noise pollution, but…

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Absolutely. Yes.
-Well, then you should stay. -[Sophie] I can't. I heard from Krystyna.

translation.en: She's not feeling well, so I have to take over with the kids.

translation.en: This was so lovely. Thank you.
That was rather embarrassing.
I invented three separate excuses in less than 30 seconds on your behalf.

translation.en: James?
You owe me.
I've fucked up, big time.
Does she have a last name?
You've probably met her. She's one of my aides.
translation.es: Seguro la conoces.Es una de mis asistentes.

translation.en: -Administrative? -Parliamentary researcher.
So she's new?
Relatively.
And young?
It had been going on for about five months.
I broke it off two weeks ago, right after the party conference.
translation.es: La dejé hace dos semanas,después de la conferencia del partido.

translation.en: It meant nothing.
I was flattered.
It was just sex.
Not that there's ever been anything wrong with that part of us. You know that.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Soph.
There's more.
You're not telling me just to tell me

translation.en: to unburden yourself.
There's more.
-Is she pregnant? -No. God, no.
The story is about to break.
translation.es: La historia saldrá a la luz.

translation.en: -When? -Tonight.
The Mail is splashing it tomorrow. Online, late tonight.
translation.es: Saldrá en The Mail mañana.Hoy en internet.

translation.en: Chris Clarke's on his way over.
He's coming here? Now? We have to get ahead of this.
We have to figure out how to protect our children from it.
translation.es: Debemos pensarcómo proteger a nuestros hijos.

translation.en: We have to do both.
[woman] Can't believe I haven't started my Christmas shopping yet.

Called to see if you fancied a drink.
-It sounds like you did. -Join us.
I'm not in the mood for a crowd.

translation.en: -The truth won today. -[door closes]
No, no, no. Kate Woodcroft won today.
Not many lawyers could've pulled that one off.

translation.en: [man 2] It's the Christmas season. Come and join us.
I hate Christmas.
I would have had you over tonight, but Felicity decided to stay in town.

translation.en: Oh, how unfelicitous.
[man 2] See you soon?
[Kate] Of course.
Have fun.
[Chris] "Top Tory cheats with aide," that's the headline.
translation.es: "Conservador tiene amoríocon su asistente", ese es el titular.

translation.en: I mean, it's not brilliant, but could be worse.
translation.es: No es brillante, pero podría ser peor.

translation.en: God knows these knobheads are capable.
translation.es: Dios sabe que estos idiotas son capaces.

translation.en: "PM's friend in trysts in the corridors of power." Don't like that.
translation.es: "Amigo del primer ministro tiene amoríoen los pasillos del poder". No me gusta.

translation.en: Oh for fuck's sake.
"Britain's most fanciable MP
had sex with his female aide in a lift in the Commons."
translation.es: tuvo sexo con su asistente en un ascensoren la Cámara de los Comunes".

translation.en: Uh, "James Whitehouse, a Home Office minister and confidant of the prime minister,
translation.es: "James Whitehouse, ministroy confidente del primer ministro,

translation.en: uh, conducted his affair with his parliamentary researcher in the Palace of Westminster.
translation.es: tuvo un amorío con una de sus asistentesen el Palacio de Westminster.

translation.en: The married father of two also shared a room

translation.en: with stunning Olivia Lytton, 28, during the party conference."
translation.es: con la imponente Olivia Lytton, 28,durante la conferencia del partido".

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, that was fucking stupid. Literally.
translation.es: En la que te metiste. Literalmente.

translation.en: [Chris] So she's a classic woman scorned. Is that it? I can't speak for her.

translation.en: [Chris] But did you speak to her leading up to this?
-Did you know this was coming? -[James] No.
translation.es: - ¿Sabías que esto iba a pasar?- No.

translation.en: [Chris] "He used her"…
[Chris] Basically, your priority from now on is to rebuild trust all around.
translation.es: Tu prioridad de ahora en máses recuperar la confianza de todos.

translation.en: [James] The party conference is not funded by taxpayers.
[Chris] Think anyone's making distinctions?
Johnny Public bankrolls your salary as a minister in Her Majesty's government.

translation.en: No one's paying you to bang the help in a House of Commons lift.
translation.es: No te pagan por cogerte a tu asistente.

translation.en: -[James] She has a brilliant mind. -[Chris] That'd make a better headline.
translation.es: - Ella es brillante.- Ese sería un mejor titular.

translation.en: "Minister bangs brainy bombshell."
translation.es: "El ministro se cogea una hermosura aguda".

translation.en: -Alliterative and to the point. -[James] Christ almighty, Chris.

translation.en: [James] I don't give a fuck about Johnny Public.
translation.es: Me importa un carajo la sociedad.

translation.en: [Chris] Johnny Public's gonna be reading this in the Daily Mail.
translation.es: La sociedad leerá esto en el Daily mail.

translation.en: Do you want to have a little chat about it?
[James] Johnny Public will support me. I'm sure of it.
translation.es: La sociedad me apoyará, no lo dudo.

translation.en: I expect she'll be dubbed "the ravishing researcher."
You're not gonna be springing any surprises on us?
Such as?
Well, announcing that you're leaving. Putting on your side of the story.
translation.es: Como anunciar que te vaso dar tu versión de los hechos.

translation.en: Do you need to ask?
-Of course I do. -Of course she's not leaving.
translation.es: - Por supuesto.- Claro que no se irá.

translation.en: -Sorry. I didn't mean to-- -[Sophie] Of course I'm not leaving.
translation.es: - Lo siento. No quise…- Claro que no me iré.

translation.en: We've been married for 12 years. We share two children.
Why would I throw all that away over a stupid mistake?
translation.es: ¿Tirar todo por la bordapor un error estúpido?

translation.en: And there's no need to offer my resignation?
The PM will make it clear if he wants that, but he doesn't abandon his old friends,
translation.es: El primer ministro decidirá eso,pero no abandona a sus amigos,

translation.en: especially not his closest, and you're one of those.
translation.es: en especial a los más cercanos,y tú eres uno de ellos.

translation.en: Says so right here.
Besides, sex doesn't have to kill a career these days.
translation.es: Además, el sexono arruina una carrera hoy en día.

translation.en: You might even gain some fans amongst the older male voter.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, they're hardly gonna argue with some touchy-feely,

translation.en: some fun on the side with a filly.
She's a woman, not a horse. I'm trying to help your husband.
translation.es: - Es una mujer, no un caballo.- Intento ayudar a tu esposo.

translation.en: And you, for that matter.
translation.es: Y a ti, si vamos al caso.

translation.en: Well, try not to reveal too much of yourself in the process.

translation.en: Someone's coming out punching. That is very good.

translation.en: That is exactly what we need right now.
Uh, so listen. No details, but also no denials.

translation.en: Denials have a way of coming back to bite you on the arse.
Therefore, do not elaborate.
The sum of your script is this, deep regret, brief affair,

translation.en: prioritise your family and constituents,
translation.es: priorizas a tu familia y electores.

translation.en: deflect and dismiss, but never deny. Got it?
-Who's there? -[girl] Me.
[James] Em?
-Were you sitting on the stairs? -How long?
-Not long. -[James] You should be asleep, darling.
I heard voices.
-Hello, Emily. -Remember Mr Clarke?
[Sophie] Let's get you back to bed. Come on.
[smacks lips] What's that Paul Newman quote?

Oh, mate. I'm only here because the PM told me to be.

and help me fix it.
Is it over?
[whispers] Yes.
Yes.
Five months?
It was, as you said, a stupid mistake.

In the broom cupboard?

Hotel rooms?

I would like to have a number in mind.

translation.en: -I would find that helpful. -I don't know. 20, 30.
She doesn't mean anything to me. It was just sex.

translation.en: It was.
I've been so stressed out at work these past many months.

translation.en: I'm honoured to have the immigration portfolio, but it is impossibly complex and literally life and death.
translation.es: Tener la cartera de inmigraciónes muy complejo, es de vida o muerte.

translation.en: I haven't even told you a fraction of it.

translation.en: She… she was just there.
I was weak.
For the life of me, it's a mystery how it even start--

I'm going to bed.

-Minister. -Olivia.
Can I get you a cab?
Yes.
Or you could get me another drink.

Before you stands a man who made a mistake.

translation.es: Como a veces les digo a mis hijos,

translation.en: under vastly less serious circumstances,
"not okay."
Forgiveness and understanding must be earned,

translation.en: as I try to repair the damage done to my beloved family

Thank you all.
That's all for today!

[Ellie] Hi. It's nice to see you.
It's nice that it's not last week. [chuckles]

Of course you will.
Sometimes, I think sex is the root of all evil. [scoffs]

At least, our sex is great. It's never been a problem for us.

Not really.

[children] Bye!

I wish she hadn't been on your payroll.

Oh, she's always been that.
Forgiving.
I guess she's always been that too.

The past is the past as far as I'm concerned.

I was planning to introduce the amendment to the immigration bill.

It says here Daddy was a Libertine.

translation.es: A la honorable damale preocupa la ecuanimidad.

translation.en: This proposed change to the immigration bill
translation.es: El cambio propuestoal proyecto de ley de inmigración

translation.en: represents the most equitable approach to both skilled and low-skilled workers
translation.es: es el enfoque más equitativo para trabajadores calificadosy poco calificados

translation.en: of any legislation in the past 50 years!
translation.es: de cualquier legislaciónde los últimos 50 años.

translation.en: -It is more inclusive, not less! -[indistinct clamoring]
Esteemed colleagues,
if I have learned anything in my 44 years on this Earth, it is this.
translation.es: si he aprendido algoen mis 44 años en la Tierra es esto:

translation.en: If it looks like a duck, walks like a duck, and quacks like a duck,
translation.es: Si parece pato,camina como pato y grazna como pato,

translation.en: vote aye for that duck.
And what about a duck caught having an affair
translation.es: ¿Y si al pato le descubren un amorío

translation.en: with a duckling in his employ?
translation.es: con una patita a su cargo?

translation.en: What does the honourable gentleman think such a duck should do?
translation.es: ¿Qué debería hacerun pato así, honorable señor?

translation.en: -[man 2] Yeah. -[man 3] Yes.
Swim.
[woman] Order! Order!
So he acquitted himself well?
Oh, you mean other than having an affair with a subordinate half his age
translation.es: ¿Más allá del amoríocon su asistente a la que le dobla en edad

translation.en: and fucking her in a Westminster lift before elevenses?
translation.es: y de cogérsela en el ascensora media mañana?

translation.en: I mean today, in the House. And she's not half his age.
translation.es: Decía en la Cámara. Y no le dobla en edad.

translation.en: -Looks it. -Plus, he's popular.
You're the one who told me he's number two on sexymp.co.uk, or whatever it is.
translation.es: ¿No estaba segundoen la lista de políticos guapos?

translation.en: He's moved to number one.
Well, that's surely a first for a member of the Conservative Party.
translation.es: Nunca visto de un miembrodel Partido Conservador.

translation.en: Besides which, he's the most naturally gifted politician on our side of the Chamber.
translation.es: Además, es el político más talentosode nuestro lado de la Cámara.

translation.en: [Chris] Still, if he gets full on MeToo'd, it could start to make your loyalty look ill-advised.
translation.es: Pero si lo llenan de denuncias,tal vez no debería seguir apoyándolo.

translation.en: It would make the public wonder what it's based on, Prime Minister.
translation.es: El público se preguntaráen qué se basa, señor.

translation.en: History. Nothing more complicated.
James Whitehouse's famous shepherd's pie.
translation.es: El famoso pastel de carnede James Whitehouse.

translation.en: -Isn't that Granny's recipe? -[James] Only better.
translation.es: - ¿No es la receta de la abuela?- Mejorada.

translation.en: This is version 2.0. We haven't had this in ages.
translation.es: - Es la versión 2.0.- Hace mucho no comíamos esto.

translation.en: I make it all the time.
Really? Is that why you had Tuppence walk you through the recipe on three occasions?
translation.es: ¿Sí? ¿Por eso Tuppencetuvo que asistirte tres veces?

translation.en: I suppose it has been quite a while.
translation.es: Bueno, supongo que pasó bastante tiempo.

translation.en: [James] Krystyna.
It's yummy, Daddy.
-Good. -Napkins.
[Krystyna] Mmm. Yes, James. Really good.
[boy] So yummy.
-Would you like some wine? -Please.
-Krystyna, would you some? -No. Thank you.
I'd like to propose a toast.
-[Emily] To what? -To Mummy.
No. Why?
'Cause she's the most wonderful woman I know.
translation.es: Es la mujer más maravillosa que conozco.

translation.en: -To Mummy. -[all] To Mummy.
-[Sophie] Sorry. -No.
-[coughs, laughs] -[Olivia] So I read your draft proposal.
translation.es: - Leí el borrador de tu propuesta.- ¿Y?

translation.en: I think it's cracking.
[James] Too bad. The hardliners are telling me it's too humane.
translation.es: Qué pena. Los conservadoresdicen que es demasiado humana.

translation.en: What do you think? Can I have some more?
[laughs] Oh God, sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.es: ¿Qué opinas? ¿Me das más? Dios, lo siento. Lo siento.

translation.en: -[James laughing] -Oh, now it's empty.
[James] Well, that explains how you managed to take advantage of me.
translation.es: Eso explica cómo te aprovechaste de mí.

translation.en: [Olivia] Oh yes. Sorry about that.
[woman] Where are you?
[Kate] At the office.
[woman] At this hour on a Friday?
That's bonkers. Come round for a drink.
translation.es: Es una locura. Ven a beber algo.

translation.en: I'd love to, but I got pulled into something.
[woman] Oh, it's the holiday season.
For fuck's sake, live a little, Woodcroft.
translation.es: Por el amor de Dios,vive un poco, Woodcroft.

translation.en: I'm already sipping a Scotch, you'll be happy to hear.
translation.es: Te alegrará saberque estoy bebiendo whisky.

translation.en: [woman] Good.
Well, you can chase it with some fizz.
A kid in my class's parents knew just what I asked Father Christmas for.
translation.es: Los padres de un niño de mi clasesabían lo que le pedí a Papá Noel.

translation.en: -[Kate] Where are Ed and your kids? -He took them to a movie.
translation.es: - ¿Y Ed y los niños?- Fueron al cine.

translation.en: So I've, more or less, one more hour of peace, quiet, and laundry.
translation.es: Así que tengo, más o menos,una hora más de paz, silencio y lavado.

translation.en: Come on. Please?
We can get pleasantly pissed while you watch me fold.
Look, I'll just be distracted until I finish with these papers.
translation.es: Estaré distraída hasta terminar con esto.

translation.en: What is it?
The usual… [sighs] …but quite high-profile.
translation.es: Lo de siempre. Pero de alto perfil.

translation.en: I'm not sure I should take this one. Of course you should.
translation.es: - No sé si debería aceptarlo.- Claro que sí.

translation.en: Look, I really shouldn't discuss it.
Oh don't be ridiculous. You can certainly tell me.
translation.es: No seas ridícula. Puedes contármelo a mí.

translation.en: Love you.
[Sophie] Thanks, Kenneth. See you in a bit.
translation.es: Gracias, Kenneth. Vuelvo en un rato.

translation.en: Yes.
[woman whispering] Is that Mrs Whitehouse?
Isn't that James Whitehouse's wife?
translation.es: ¿No es la esposa de James Whitehouse?

translation.en: -Sophie. -Mrs Whitehouse.
[man] Can you give us a comment about your husband's affair? Mrs Whitehouse.
translation.es: - ¿Algunas palabras sobre lo de su esposo?- Señora Whitehouse.

translation.en: [man] Sophie!
[Olivia] James.
-Hi, it's Whitehouse. -[whispers] Hi.
-Can I take your coat? -Thanks.
-Really? -[James] I know.
Hello.
-Hello. -Hello, darling.
-You remember Lawrence Hughes-Davies? -Of course.
-[Sophie] How are you? -Very good.
-[Sophie] Good. Yeah. -Listen, I was just saying to James.
translation.es: - Bien.- Recién le decía a James:

translation.en: I've witnessed every kind of weather
translation.es: he sido testigo de todo tipo de clima

translation.en: in the three and a half decades I've been here.
translation.es: en los 35 años que he estado aquí.

translation.en: This doesn't qualify as a squall. Not even a disturbance.
translation.es: Esto no califica como chubasco.Ni siquiera como un desajuste.

translation.en: Just a bit of rain, dear.
translation.es: Es solo un poco de lluvia.

translation.en: And look… [chuckles] …it's passed.
Now, boys will be boys,
but I'm sure this one has learned his lesson.
translation.es: pero seguro este aprendió la lección.

translation.en: My wife always said, "Once, okay. Twice, go away."
translation.es: Mi esposa dice:"Una vez te perdono, dos, te abandono".

translation.en: I left it at once.
Enjoy your tea. Hmm?
I'm sorry about that. [chuckles]
You know, I thought I was, um, fine coming here,
translation.es: Pensé que no me afectaría venir,

translation.en: but it's bringing it all back.
The affair?
No. My fear.
[James] About what?
I thought we were clear all those years ago.
translation.es: Creí que lo habíamos aclarado hace mucho.

translation.en: I am not my mother.
I will not live my mother's life.
translation.es: No viviré la vida de mi madre.

translation.en: I will not be the long-suffering spouse.
"Once, okay. Twice, go away." Fuck off.
translation.es: "Una vez te perdono, dos, te abandono".Vete al carajo.

translation.en: I'm not interested.
And I can't do it, James.
Especially in the fishbowl of politics.
translation.es: En especial, en la pecera de la política.

translation.en: I always thought that our marriage was, um…
…superior. [scoffs]
Immune.
Was that the lift?
[James] What do you mean?
The one that I just came up in.
Was that one of the sites of your affair?
translation.es: ¿Fue uno de los lugares de tu amorío?

translation.en: The one that made the headlines?
Jesus.
[James] I'm so sorry.
I should have found another…
It was thoughtless.
Soph, as awful as this week has been, and everything I put you through,
translation.es: Soph, a pesar de lo horribleque fue esta semana, y de todo lo que te hice pasar,

translation.en: I am grateful for one thing.
The certainty that you are the person I want to die with.
translation.es: Tener la certeza de que eresla persona con la que quiero morir.

translation.en: Would die for.
Making this right with you is all I care about.
translation.es: Lo único que me importaes arreglar las cosas contigo.

translation.en: [James] You and the kids.
If you tell me to…
I will give up all this.
I swear.
I will stand up right now and tell this room full of MPs that I resign.
translation.es: Me pararé aquí mismoy les diré a todos que renuncio.

translation.en: Right now.
If that's what you want.
If the future doesn't include you, Sophie Whitehouse,
translation.es: Si el futuro no te incluye a ti,Sophie Whitehouse,

translation.en: the future is shite.
[James] You sure you don't want Kenneth to take you back?
You'll get home earlier this way.
translation.es: Así llegarás a casa más temprano.

translation.en: Come on, James!
[Sophie] Come on, James!
Bloody hell, they're fast.
They're unstoppable.
If only he were a bit dim, it might seem fair.
translation.es: Si fuera un poco tonto, sería justo.

translation.en: But no, your boyfriend got dealt all the best cards,
translation.es: Pero no, a tu noviole tocaron todas las mejores cartas,

translation.en: including a spot as an Oxford Blue.
translation.es: incluso la distinción deportiva de Oxford.

translation.en: [Sophie] What?
It comes from the Canaanite word for "lord."
translation.es: Viene de la palabra cananea para "señor".

translation.en: He's the god of beauty and desire.
translation.es: Es el dios de la belleza y el deseo.

translation.en: Holly, James Whitehouse is taken.
I'm going to marry that boy one day.
translation.es: Algún día me casaré con él.

translation.en: You gonna tell him you're gonna marry him?
He knows.
He just doesn't know that he knows. [chuckles]
translation.es: Pero no sabe que lo sabe.

translation.en: Yes, mate.
[man] Oh, James. Nice to see Sophie here.
translation.es: James. Qué bueno ver a Sophie aquí.

translation.en: [James] Thank you.
-Mr Whitehouse. -[James] Yes?
Detective Sergeant Willis. This is my colleague, Detective Constable Rydon.
translation.es: Sargento detective Willis.Y la detective Constable Rydon.

translation.en: We've been trying to contact you. But your office seemed to have lost track of you.
translation.es: - Lo estábamos buscando.- Nadie podía contactarlo.

translation.en: Well, I switched my mobile off while I had tea with my wife.
translation.es: Apagué el celular.Tomaba el té con mi esposa.

translation.en: Criminal behaviour, I know. [chuckles]
-May I ask what this is about? -Olivia Lytton.
What about her?
We'd like to ask you a few questions in connection with an allegation.
translation.es: Tenemos preguntasen relación con una acusación.

translation.en: An allegation of what? Rape, sir.
translation.es: - ¿Una acusación de qué?- De violación, señor.

translation.en: An allegation of rape.
♪ How the mighty fall ♪
